subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Helio Castroneves is hoping to ride all the way to the series title that has eluded him in four seasons in the now-defunct CART series and the last eight full seasons in IndyCar.
snippet: Helio Castroneves is hoping to ride all the way to the series title that has eluded him in four seasons in the now-defunct CART series and the last eight full seasons in IndyCar.
